articles.title: DPRK-Japan Red Cross and inter-governmental preliminary talks to be held
articles.content:
DPRK-Japan Red Cross and inter-governmental preliminary talks to be held 
   Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-Japan Red Cross talks to solve humanitarian issues and director-level preliminary talks between the ministries of foreign affairs of the two countries for inter-governmental talks will be held in Beijing on December 19 and 20 separately.
